listing.listing_description:
Open one wall of the sliding glass doors in this sleek silver-grey-blue living room, and you can feel the urban vibe of Green Point. The 180-degree view stretches to the Atlantic. There are a generous open deck and seating that overhangs the peak. This is the yin side of the house, bustling, vibrant, and hip.

On the opposite side of the room is a matching set of sliding glass doors that bookend the minimalist living room. They open onto an elaborately tiered, latticed wood terrace with a raised lap pool running its length ending at an outdoor fireplace with bank seating in-between. This is the yang side of the house, tranquil, calm, and peaceful.

Stay in or go out is always the question at One Springbok. It’s strategically located in the center of Cape Town and works for getting around and seeing things then heading back to relax and unwind. Somerset Road is the main street in this neighborhood for restaurants, delis, cafes, and nightclubs.

One Springbok is perfect for entertaining. Open and airy with night views of the glittering city, add the soft glow from the pool and dancing light from the fireplace, creates dramatic points and counter-points. With the open galley kitchen and dining area central to the living room, friends and family can mingle from dusk to dawn, watching the sun break over Table Mountain.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sharp aesthetics define this coastal villa, complete with seaside views and ample space. With this brand new home, guests can kick off a pleasant day on Crete with a dip in the swimming pool, before sipping coffee under the sunlit terrace’s trees. The stylish, and functional interior is perfected by subtle design touches, with beaches, Chania’s Venetian Harbor and the rich Cretan countryside nearby. 

This villa’s interior is a study in economical space use and tasteful outfitting, with a decor scheme making use of traditional Greek whites and timber. Finely-crafted chairs and a table sit alongside a compact, attractive kitchenette, with visual art and unusual light fixtures adding gentle character to the room. The upper bedrooms offer great views of the local coastline, while the well-lit basement floor of the home adds even more space. Passing a relaxed afternoon on the home’s sun loungers, or chilling out with the home’s entertainment system is always a pleasure at Fos Villa. 

Proximity to a number of excellent beaches, including Glaros and Iguana beach, are amongst the home’s benefits. Guests are just a short drive from the dramatic harbor and signature lighthouse of Chania’s port, with a huge range of bakeries, cafes and bars to be discovered along the winding streets. From Fos Villa, indulge in a coastal drive to remember, stopping off at numerous sites of Cretan heritage, from ancient ruins and temples, to serene monasteries and active wineries that overlook the blue Mediterranean.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
From dawn til dusk 26 Sunset Villa is an ultra modern villa with a private chef and butler that delivers ocean views and luxury on a grand scale. This is a magnificent, roomy villa in one of Cape Town’s most exclusive suburbs. It is just a short walk from the beaches of secluded Sandy Bay and surfing favorite Llandudno. The awe-inspiring Atlantic paints a glorious backdrop and the villa matches this with opulent furnishings and contemporary décor.

Sit back, relax and let this villa serve up a vacation to remember. Your hand-picked team of expert staff will be on hand to cater for all your needs, from fresh juice on the breakfast terrace to cocktails on your private deck. They will encourage you to sample the best South African wines and food in the most idyllic of surroundings. Ask them for recommendations of the best things to do near Llandudno, a quiet, upmarket town close to a range of Cape attractions.

Clad in weathered wood and natural stone, this delightful villa blends artfully into its idyllic hillside surroundings. Floor to ceiling glass doors slide back to reveal exceptional views and a feast for the senses. Listen to the waves break on the shore bringing with them the scent of the ocean. Comfort and luxury are all around you so slip into the slender heated pool, relax on a lounger on the deck or gather around the cozy fire.

The villa’s six expansive suites are spread over two levels to maximize the magnificent ocean and mountain views. They boast a range of delightful touches designed to relax and refresh you. Each one opens on to private decks overlooking the spectacular coastline. King-sized beds provide extra comfort while air conditioning moderates the daytime heat and evening chill. Rain-effect showers and spacious tubs are highlights of the en-suite bathrooms stocked with a host of fragrant, revitalizing toiletries.

Llandudno is renowned for its quality of life so there are no street lights or shops to clutter your stay. However, a short drive away you’ll discover the delights of popular Camps Bay and picturesque Hout Bay. Just across the mountain range, the bright lights of Cape Town also beckon. Teeming with life, attractions and activities this city is crowned by Table Mountain. It’s top of the to-do list whether shrouded in cotton candy cloud or bathed in glorious sunlight.

Read more about this villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/2015/06/cape-town-villas-26-sunset/)

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Stay in style in the heart of Crete at Casa Blue. Built on a hillside facing the Aegean Sea, this chic vacation rental is close to shopping, dining, beaches and local sights from ancient churches to traditional villages. Its three bedrooms are the perfect size for a sunny holiday with family, a getaway with a group of friends or even a private honeymoon.

The villa is surrounded by stone walls and gardens with lemon trees, rose bushes, pomegranates and flower beds. Tucked into the grounds are a sun-soaked terrace with a swimming pool, lounging and dining areas, and a barbecue, as well as basketball and tennis half-courts and a ping-pong table. There’s also a satellite TV and Wi-Fi inside.

With its sleek lines and modern furniture, Casa Blue feels like a corner of California in the middle of the Crete landscape. The living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen are all in one open-concept space with panoramic views of the hills and coastline, so you can enjoy the luxury of having everyone gather together.

The villa has one bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, and two bedrooms that each have a king bed and shared access to a hall bathroom. The two king bedrooms are together on the lowest floor, the main living areas are on the middle floor, and the queen bedroom sits by itself on the villa’s top floor.

Though Casa Blue feels like a quiet island haven, it’s less than a 10-minute drive from the towns of Agia Pelagia, Ligaria and Achlada, as well as Mononaftis and Psaromoura beaches. Spend a day by the water, then have a drink or dinner at a local taverna. Be sure to take a day trip into the city of Heraklion, whose palaces and museums are well worth a visit.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
